metadata.taskDesc: Dynamically Synthesize Agents and Orchestrate Information Passing
metadata.agentDesc: Dynamically Synthesize Agents and Orchestrate Information Passing

metadata.taskDesc: Conduct a web search to gather foundational information about MIMO technology specifically in the context of 6G networks.
metadata.agentDesc: A researcher specialized in telecommunications who will analyze and summarize the latest developments in MIMO technology related to 6G.

metadata.taskDesc: Fetch recent research papers from arXiv that discuss new MIMO specifications in 6G networks.
metadata.agentDesc: An analyst who specializes in reviewing and summarizing academic research papers in telecommunications, particularly in MIMO technologies.

metadata.taskDesc: Obtain relevant technical specifications from the 3GPP that relate to MIMO technology in 6G.
metadata.agentDesc: A specialist in 3GPP standards who will extract and summarize the relevant technical specifications regarding MIMO for 6G.

metadata.taskDesc: Perform a web search to identify industry trends, applications, and practical implementations of MIMO technology in 6G networks.
metadata.agentDesc: An analyst focused on market trends in telecommunications who will identify and summarize current applications of MIMO technology in 6G.

metadata.taskDesc: Summarize the findings from task_1, task_2, task_3, and task_4 to create a coherent overview of new MIMO specifications in 6G networks.
metadata.agentDesc: A specialist in creating technical documentation who will compile and summarize findings from various sources into a cohesive report.
